product_desc:
“I unexpectedly needed to be in NYC to meet with some colleagues and due to the short notice and some big event happening, it was simply impossible to find a hotel in the city center that was anywhere close to being considered affordable" said John who is a manager in a global firm and frequently stays in hostels when traveling for work since he discovered them last year by accident

Shared-rooms, long associated with lone backpackers and groups of students, have now attracted even young business travelers consisting almost 20% of hostel guests during the week. In fact, there is a small difference between the cost of Single & Twin rooms, making Single rooms expensive per capita in regular hotels

ShareTwin.com is a marketplace for sharing Twin hotel rooms and Airbnb flats with other people (or businesses) and splitting the cost among them. ShareTwin.com is great for startups on tight budgets and young professionals e.g. entry or junior-level employees who are ready to plug in anywhere
high_concept: Marketplace for Sharing Twin Hotel Rooms and Airbnb Flats whilst Business Travel or Events
name: ShareTwin.com
